snippet: Officers charged Christopher Adam Tang, 30, with six driving violations, saying they were able to recreate the wild ride by using surveillance video.
abstract: Police arrest Christopher Adam Tang and charge him with six driving violations after Tang posts YouTube video, captured using dashboard camera, of wild 26.5-mile journey circumnavigating Manhattan in record 24 minutes; police say they were able to recreate drive using surveillance video.
lead_paragraph: Officers charged Christopher Adam Tang, 30, with six driving violations, saying they were able to recreate the wild ride by using surveillance video.

headline.main: Arrest Made in Wild Drive Around Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Driver Boasts of Wild Ride, And Police Make an Arrest
